SQL_STMT_U.val: select * from ( select T0.DocDate as 'Date', T0.DocNum as 'Document Number', T0.CardName as 'Supplier / Vendor', Case when T1.ObjType = 46 then 'Outgoing Payment' end 'Transaction', cast(T1.baseabs as varchar(15)) as 'DocNum Reference', case when T1.InvType = 204 then 'AP DP' when T1.InvType = 18 then 'AP Invoice' when T1.InvType = 19 then 'AP CN' end 'Transaction Reference', concat ( case when T0.CashAcct = '' then '-' else t0.CashAcct end, '/', case when T0.TrsfrAcct = '' then '-' else t0.trsfracct end, '/', case when T0.CheckAcct = '' then '-' else t0.CheckAcct end ) as 'Cash / Transfer / Check Account', concat ( case when T3.acctName = '' or T3.AcctName is null then '-' else T3.acctName end, '/', case when T2.acctName = '' or T2.AcctName is null then '-' else T2.acctName end, '/', case when T4.acctName = '' or T4.AcctName is null then '-' else T4.acctName end ) as 'Cash / Transfer / Check Name', T1.PaidSum 'Payment Amount', T0.DocCurr as 'Currency', T0.CashSum * T0.DocRate as 'Cash Amount', case when T0.DocCurr <> 'IDR' then T0.CashSum else 0 end as 'Cash Amount FC', T0.TrsfrSum * T0.DocRate as 'Bank Amount', case when T0.DocCurr <> 'IDR' then T0.TrsfrSum else 0 end as 'Bank Amount FC', T0.BcgSum * -1 as 'Bank Charges', Trim(REPLACE(T0.Comments,char(13),'')) as 'Remarks' from OVPM T0 inner join VPM2 T1 on T0.DocEntry = T1.DocNum left join OACT T2 on T0.TrsfrAcct = T2.AcctCode left join OACT T3 on T0.CashAcct = T3.AcctCode left join OACT T4 on T0.CheckAcct = T4.AcctCode where T0.Canceled = 'N' and ((ISNULL(T2.FatherNum,'') like '%'+ISNULL(':4','')+'%') or (ISNULL(T3.FatherNum,'') like '%'+ISNULL(':4','')+'%') or (ISNULL(T4.FatherNum,'') like '%'+ISNULL(':4','')+'%')) union All select T0.DocDate as 'Date', T0.DocNum as 'Document Number', T0.CardName as 'Supplier / Vendor', Case when T1.ObjType = 46 then 'Outgoing Payment' end 'Transaction', '-' as 'DocNum Reference', 'Type Account' as 'Transaction Reference', concat ( case when T0.CashAcct = '' then '-' else t0.CashAcct end, '/', case when T0.TrsfrAcct = '' then '-' else t0.trsfracct end, '/', case when T0.CheckAcct = '' then '-' else t0.CheckAcct end ) as 'Cash / Transfer / Check Account', concat ( case when T3.acctName = '' or T3.AcctName is null then '-' else T3.acctName end, '/', case when T2.acctName = '' or T2.AcctName is null then '-' else T2.acctName end, '/', case when T4.acctName = '' or T4.AcctName is null then '-' else T4.acctName end ) as 'Cash / Transfer / Check Name', T1.SumApplied 'Payment Amount', T0.DocCurr as 'Currency', T0.CashSum * T0.DocRate as 'Cash Amount', case when T0.DocCurr <> 'IDR' then T0.CashSum else 0 end as 'Cash Amount FC', T0.TrsfrSum * T0.DocRate as 'Bank Amount', case when T0.DocCurr <> 'IDR' then T0.TrsfrSum else 0 end as 'Bank Amount FC', T0.BcgSum * -1 as 'Bank Charges', Trim(REPLACE(T0.Comments,char(13),'')) as 'Remarks' from OVPM T0 inner join VPM4 T1 on T0.DocEntry = T1.DocNum left join OACT T2 on T0.TrsfrAcct = T2.AcctCode left join OACT T3 on T0.CashAcct = T3.AcctCode left join OACT T4 on T0.CheckAcct = T4.AcctCode where T0.Canceled = 'N' and ((ISNULL(T2.FatherNum,'') like '%'+ISNULL(':4','')+'%') or (ISNULL(T3.FatherNum,'') like '%'+ISNULL(':4','')+'%') or (ISNULL(T4.FatherNum,'') like '%'+ISNULL(':4','')+'%')) union All select T0.DocDate as 'Date', T0.DocNum as 'Document Number', T0.CardName as 'Supplier / Vendor', Case when T1.ObjType = 24 then 'Incoming Payment' end 'Transaction', cast(T1.baseabs as varchar(15)) as 'DocNum Reference', case when T1.InvType = 203 then 'AR DP' when T1.InvType = 13 then 'AR Invoice' when T1.InvType = 14 then 'AR CN' end 'Transaction Reference', concat ( case when T0.CashAcct = '' then '-' else t0.CashAcct end, '/', case when T0.TrsfrAcct = '' then '-' else t0.trsfracct end, '/', case when T0.CheckAcct = '' then '-' else t0.CheckAcct end ) as 'Cash / Transfer / Check Account', concat ( case when T3.acctName = '' or T3.AcctName is null then '-' else T3.acctName end, '/', case when T2.acctName = '' or T2.AcctName is null then '-' else T2.acctName end, '/', case when T4.acctName = '' or T4.AcctName is null then '-' else T4.acctName end ) as 'Cash / Transfer / Check Name', T1.PaidSum 'Payment Amount', T0.DocCurr as 'Currency', T0.CashSum * T0.DocRate as 'Cash Amount', case when T0.DocCurr <> 'IDR' then T0.CashSum else 0 end as 'Cash Amount FC', T0.TrsfrSum * T0.DocRate as 'Bank Amount', case when T0.DocCurr <> 'IDR' then T0.TrsfrSum else 0 end as 'Bank Amount FC', T0.BcgSum * -1 as 'Bank Charges', Trim(REPLACE(T0.Comments,char(13),'')) as 'Remarks' from ORCT T0 inner join RCT2 T1 on T0.DocEntry = T1.DocNum left join OACT T2 on T0.TrsfrAcct = T2.AcctCode left join OACT T3 on T0.CashAcct = T3.AcctCode left join OACT T4 on T0.CheckAcct = T4.AcctCode where T0.Canceled = 'N' and ((ISNULL(T2.FatherNum,'') like '%'+ISNULL(':4','')+'%') or (ISNULL(T3.FatherNum,'') like '%'+ISNULL(':4','')+'%') or (ISNULL(T4.FatherNum,'') like '%'+ISNULL(':4','')+'%')) Union All select T0.DocDate as 'Date', T0.DocNum as 'Document Number', T0.CardName as 'Supplier / Vendor', Case when T1.ObjType = 24 then 'Incoming Payment' end 'Transaction', '-' as 'DocNum Reference', 'Type Account' as 'Transaction Reference', concat ( case when T0.CashAcct = '' then '-' else t0.CashAcct end, '/', case when T0.TrsfrAcct = '' then '-' else t0.trsfracct end, '/', case when T0.CheckAcct = '' then '-' else t0.CheckAcct end ) as 'Cash / Transfer / Check Account', concat ( case when T3.acctName = '' or T3.AcctName is null then '-' else T3.acctName end, '/', case when T2.acctName = '' or T2.AcctName is null then '-' else T2.acctName end, '/', case when T4.acctName = '' or T4.AcctName is null then '-' else T4.acctName end ) as 'Cash / Transfer / Check Name', T1.SumApplied 'Payment Amount', T0.DocCurr as 'Currency', T0.CashSum * T0.DocRate as 'Cash Amount', case when T0.DocCurr <> 'IDR' then T0.CashSum else 0 end as 'Cash Amount FC', T0.TrsfrSum * T0.DocRate as 'Bank Amount', case when T0.DocCurr <> 'IDR' then T0.TrsfrSum else 0 end as 'Bank Amount FC', T0.BcgSum * -1 as 'Bank Charges', Trim(REPLACE(T0.Comments,char(13),'')) as 'Remarks' from ORCT T0 inner join RCT4 T1 on T0.DocEntry = T1.DocNum left join OACT T2 on T0.TrsfrAcct = T2.AcctCode left join OACT T3 on T0.CashAcct = T3.AcctCode left join OACT T4 on T0.CheckAcct = T4.AcctCode where T0.Canceled = 'N' and ((ISNULL(T2.FatherNum,'') like '%'+ISNULL(':4','')+'%') or (ISNULL(T3.FatherNum,'') like '%'+ISNULL(':4','')+'%') or (ISNULL(T4.FatherNum,'') like '%'+ISNULL(':4','')+'%')) ) as X where (x.Date between ':1' and ':2') and (X.[Transaction] = ':3' OR ':3' is null or ':3' = '') and X.[Cash / Transfer / Check Account]<>'-/-/' -- and (ISNULL(X.[Cash / Transfer / Check Account],'') like '%'+ISNULL(':4','')+'%') Order by X.[Transaction], x.Date asc

ExpSyntax.val: DataViewToDNDataTable(0,'Date,Document Number,Supplier/Vendor,Transaction,DocNum Reference,Transaction Reference,Cash / Transfer / Check Account,Cash / Transfer / Check Name,Payment Amount,Currency,Cash Amount,Cash Amount FC,Bank Amount,Bank Amount FC,Bank Charges,Remarks','@')

DataViewToText(0,'Date,Document Number,Supplier/Vendor,Transaction,DocNum Reference,Transaction Reference,Cash / Transfer / Check Account,Cash / Transfer / Check Name,Payment Amount,Currency,Cash Amount,Cash Amount FC,Bank Amount,Bank Amount FC,Bank Charges,Remarks','@',{32768,84},';','',0)

SQL_STMT_U.val: select * from ( select T0.DocDate as 'Date', T0.DocNum as 'Document Number', T0.CardName as 'Supplier / Vendor', Case when T1.ObjType = 46 then 'Outgoing Payment' end 'Transaction', T1.baseabs as 'DocNum Reference', case when T1.InvType = 204 then 'AP DP' when T1.InvType = 18 then 'AP Invoice' when T1.InvType = 19 then 'AP CN' end 'Transaction Reference', concat ( case when T0.CashAcct = '' then '-' else t0.CashAcct end, '/', case when T0.TrsfrAcct = '' then '-' else t0.trsfracct end, '/', case when T0.CheckAcct = '' then '-' else t0.CheckAcct end ) as 'Cash / Transfer / Check Account', concat ( case when T3.acctName = '' or T3.AcctName is null then '-' else T3.acctName end, '/', case when T2.acctName = '' or T2.AcctName is null then '-' else T2.acctName end, '/', case when T4.acctName = '' or T4.AcctName is null then '-' else T4.acctName end ) as 'Cash / Transfer / Check Name', T1.PaidSum 'Payment Amount', T0.DocCurr as 'Currency', T0.CashSum * T0.DocRate as 'Cash Amount', case when T0.DocCurr <> 'IDR' then T0.CashSum else 0 end as 'Cash Amount FC', T0.TrsfrSum * T0.DocRate as 'Bank Amount', case when T0.DocCurr <> 'IDR' then T0.TrsfrSum else 0 end as 'Bank Amount FC', T0.BcgSum * -1 as 'Bank Charges', T0.Comments as 'Remarks' from OVPM T0 inner join VPM2 T1 on T0.DocEntry = T1.DocNum left join OACT T2 on T0.TrsfrAcct = T2.AcctCode left join OACT T3 on T0.CashAcct = T3.AcctCode left join OACT T4 on T0.CheckAcct = T4.AcctCode where T0.Canceled = 'N' union All select T0.DocDate as 'Date', T0.DocNum as 'Document Number', T0.CardName as 'Supplier / Vendor', Case when T1.ObjType = 46 then 'Outgoing Payment' end 'Transaction', '-' as 'DocNum Reference', 'Type Account' as 'Transaction Reference', concat ( case when T0.CashAcct = '' then '-' else t0.CashAcct end, '/', case when T0.TrsfrAcct = '' then '-' else t0.trsfracct end, '/', case when T0.CheckAcct = '' then '-' else t0.CheckAcct end ) as 'Cash / Transfer / Check Account', concat ( case when T3.acctName = '' or T3.AcctName is null then '-' else T3.acctName end, '/', case when T2.acctName = '' or T2.AcctName is null then '-' else T2.acctName end, '/', case when T4.acctName = '' or T4.AcctName is null then '-' else T4.acctName end ) as 'Cash / Transfer / Check Name', T1.SumApplied 'Payment Amount', T0.DocCurr as 'Currency', T0.CashSum * T0.DocRate as 'Cash Amount', case when T0.DocCurr <> 'IDR' then T0.CashSum else 0 end as 'Cash Amount FC', T0.TrsfrSum * T0.DocRate as 'Bank Amount', case when T0.DocCurr <> 'IDR' then T0.TrsfrSum else 0 end as 'Bank Amount FC', T0.BcgSum * -1 as 'Bank Charges', T0.Comments as 'Remarks' from OVPM T0 inner join VPM4 T1 on T0.DocEntry = T1.DocNum left join OACT T2 on T0.TrsfrAcct = T2.AcctCode left join OACT T3 on T0.CashAcct = T3.AcctCode left join OACT T4 on T0.CheckAcct = T4.AcctCode where T0.Canceled = 'N' union All select T0.DocDate as 'Date', T0.DocNum as 'Document Number', T0.CardName as 'Supplier / Vendor', Case when T1.ObjType = 24 then 'Incoming Payment' end 'Transaction', T1.baseabs as 'DocNum Reference', case when T1.InvType = 203 then 'AR DP' when T1.InvType = 13 then 'AR Invoice' when T1.InvType = 14 then 'AR CN' end 'Transaction Reference', concat ( case when T0.CashAcct = '' then '-' else t0.CashAcct end, '/', case when T0.TrsfrAcct = '' then '-' else t0.trsfracct end, '/', case when T0.CheckAcct = '' then '-' else t0.CheckAcct end ) as 'Cash / Transfer / Check Account', concat ( case when T3.acctName = '' or T3.AcctName is null then '-' else T3.acctName end, '/', case when T2.acctName = '' or T2.AcctName is null then '-' else T2.acctName end, '/', case when T4.acctName = '' or T4.AcctName is null then '-' else T4.acctName end ) as 'Cash / Transfer / Check Name', T1.PaidSum 'Payment Amount', T0.DocCurr as 'Currency', T0.CashSum * T0.DocRate as 'Cash Amount', case when T0.DocCurr <> 'IDR' then T0.CashSum else 0 end as 'Cash Amount FC', T0.TrsfrSum * T0.DocRate as 'Bank Amount', case when T0.DocCurr <> 'IDR' then T0.TrsfrSum else 0 end as 'Bank Amount FC', T0.BcgSum * -1 as 'Bank Charges', T0.Comments as 'Remarks' from ORCT T0 inner join RCT2 T1 on T0.DocEntry = T1.DocNum left join OACT T2 on T0.TrsfrAcct = T2.AcctCode left join OACT T3 on T0.CashAcct = T3.AcctCode left join OACT T4 on T0.CheckAcct = T4.AcctCode where T0.Canceled = 'N' Union All select T0.DocDate as 'Date', T0.DocNum as 'Document Number', T0.CardName as 'Supplier / Vendor', Case when T1.ObjType = 24 then 'Incoming Payment' end 'Transaction', '-' as 'DocNum Reference', 'Type Account' as 'Transaction Reference', concat ( case when T0.CashAcct = '' then '-' else t0.CashAcct end, '/', case when T0.TrsfrAcct = '' then '-' else t0.trsfracct end, '/', case when T0.CheckAcct = '' then '-' else t0.CheckAcct end ) as 'Cash / Transfer / Check Account', concat ( case when T3.acctName = '' or T3.AcctName is null then '-' else T3.acctName end, '/', case when T2.acctName = '' or T2.AcctName is null then '-' else T2.acctName end, '/', case when T4.acctName = '' or T4.AcctName is null then '-' else T4.acctName end ) as 'Cash / Transfer / Check Name', T1.SumApplied 'Payment Amount', T0.DocCurr as 'Currency', T0.CashSum * T0.DocRate as 'Cash Amount', case when T0.DocCurr <> 'IDR' then T0.CashSum else 0 end as 'Cash Amount FC', T0.TrsfrSum * T0.DocRate as 'Bank Amount', case when T0.DocCurr <> 'IDR' then T0.TrsfrSum else 0 end as 'Bank Amount FC', T0.BcgSum * -1 as 'Bank Charges', T0.Comments as 'Remarks' from ORCT T0 inner join RCT4 T1 on T0.DocEntry = T1.DocNum left join OACT T2 on T0.TrsfrAcct = T2.AcctCode left join OACT T3 on T0.CashAcct = T3.AcctCode left join OACT T4 on T0.CheckAcct = T4.AcctCode where T0.Canceled = 'N' ) as X where x.Date between ':1' and ':2' Order by X.[Transaction], x.Date asc

ExpSyntax.val: DataViewToDNDataTable(0,'Date,Document Number,Supplier/Vendor,Transaction,DocNum Reference,Transaction Reference,Cash / Transfer / Check Account,Cash / Transfer / Check Name,Payment Amount,Currency,Cash Amount,Cash Amount FC,Bank Amount,Bank Amount FC,Bank Charges,Remarks','@')
